messages.subject: Bugu: The Spirit of Samurai Warrior
messages.msgSnippet: Sept. 15 - Nov. 10, 2007 George J. Doizaki Gallery JACCC NORTH GALLERY Tuesday - Friday 12n - 5p Sat 11a - 4p (from the brochure) The exhibition will examine
messages.messageBody:
Sept. 15 - Nov. 10, 2007

George J. Doizaki Gallery
JACCC NORTH GALLERY

Tuesday - Friday 12n - 5p

Sat 11a - 4p

(from the brochure)

The exhibition will examine how Bugu is represented through manga,
and will include a section for gallery-goers to try on replica armor
and include video of kendo, sumo and yabusame bouts.

They are also going to show four Samurai movies on Sept. 30th. I
made a post about it in the Japanese entertainment portion of the
Samurai Citidel Forums.

Go to jaccc.org for more information.

-Bryan the Popcorn Samruai www.popcornsamurai.com
